FuncDef: The display virtual-ethernet ve-group command displays the binding relationship between Virtual Ethernet (VE) interfaces and a VE-group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a VE-group.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 8192.

Specifies the slot number of a interface board.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If a device is configured with many VE-groups, you can use the command to view the relationship between VE interfaces and VE-groups.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
